means: （指钱，财产等）浪费，乱花( squander的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She squandered millions on a life of make-believe.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为一种虚幻的生活挥金如土。

sentence.Network_en: He had squandered his chances to win.
sentence.Network_cn: 他白白浪费了获胜的机会。

sentence.Network_en: He squandered all his money on gambling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把自己所有的钱都糟蹋在赌博上了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: he has squandered all his savings on drink ., 他把存的钱全买酒喝了.
I had feared that my time squandered and my last penny lost ., 我只恐我的时间浪掷了 , 我的最后一文钱也丢掉了.
it has been acidified , dirtied and squandered .水变酸了，变脏了，任人挥霍。
But when the tap ran freely , water was squandered , and - inevitably - stopped., 但当水龙头可以免费开时 , 水被大量浪费 , 然后 － 可避免的 － 没了.

list.abs: squandered money cannot be replaced ; a wasted effort ., 浪费的金钱是不能被换回的 ; 白费的努力.
squamose 有鳞片的squander away 浪费掉squander 浪费
don't blow that chance . don't 4 squander your best asset , which is yourself .不要放过这次机会，不要浪费你最大的财富，这就是你自己。
you squandered the opportunity to get and advanced degree .你浪费了一次获得高级学位的机会。

entry.tran: 浪费，挥霍(金钱、资源、机遇等)
entry.def: If you squander money, resources, or opportunities, you waste them.

example.ex: Hooker didn't squander his money on flashy cars or other vices...
example.tran: 胡克没有将自己的钱浪费在豪华轿车或其他恶习上。

example.ex: He had squandered his chances to win.
example.tran: 他白白浪费了获胜的机会。

auth_sentence.content: A penitent prodigal who has squandered God's gifts.
auth_sentence.res_content: A penitent prodigal who has squandered God's gifts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A penitent prodigal who has squandered God's gifts.

auth_sentence.content: The second chance may well have been squandered.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second chance may well have been squandered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second chance may well have been squandered.

auth_sentence.content: I've never squandered an opportunity to read.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've never squandered an opportunity to read.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've never squandered an opportunity to read.
